oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Book entitled "Readings from the Holy Scriptures for Jewish Soldiers and Sailors"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pocket Old Testament having tan cloth pasteboard cover and inscribed on the inside front cover "from Louis Stern / Gen. Hos. (Hospital?) #5 /Fort Ontario / N.Y" "To / Celia Sosensky / 187 E. Hancock Ave. / Detroit, Michigan." "March 6, 1919, U.S.A." These Old Testaments were published by the Jewish Publication Society of America and distributed by the Jewish Welfare Board for the benefit of Jewish soldiers in the American Army.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World war, 1914-1918; World war, 1914-1918 - History
